headline: DataDog Inc (DDOG) Set To Be a Beneficiary of Vendor Consolidation
summary: Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ:DDOG) is one of the 15 software stocks with the highest upside potential. In the first week of January, a number of financial services firms issued significant updates on the company. On January 7, Truist Financial analyst Miller Jump lowered its price target for the shares from $195 to $140. However, he reiterated […]

headline: Datadog's Q4 2025 Earnings: What to Expect
summary: Datadog is poised to release its fourth-quarter results soon, and analysts predict a single-digit rise in the company’s bottom-line figure.
